leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 闭环科研-主动学习/贝叶斯优化生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 设计→执行→更新→再设计→评测

tools.name: ARES_OS
tools.one_line_profile: Research software for closed-loop autonomous experimentation systems
tools.detailed_description: ARES OS is designed to streamline the creation of systems for closed-loop, autonomous experimentation, facilitating the integration of hardware and AI for scientific discovery.

tools.name: pyLabLib
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for device control and experiment automation
tools.detailed_description: A library for controlling various laboratory devices (cameras, stages, sensors) and automating experiments, supporting a wide range of hardware.

tools.name: ExpensiveOptimBenchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for surrogate-based optimisation algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking tool for evaluating surrogate-based optimization algorithms on expensive black-box functions, useful for developing optimization methods in scientific contexts.

tools.name: Aqueduct Core
tools.one_line_profile: Core functionality for the Aqueduct experiment management system
tools.detailed_description: The core backend and logic for Aqueduct, a system designed to manage and orchestrate scientific experiments.

tools.name: AutoRA
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Research Assistant framework
tools.detailed_description: A framework for closed-loop empirical research that automates the cycle of experiment design, data collection, and model discovery.

tools.name: Axelrod
tools.one_line_profile: Research tool for the Iterated Prisoner's Dilemma
tools.detailed_description: A library for conducting research on the Iterated Prisoner's Dilemma, used in evolutionary game theory and social science simulations.

tools.name: VOPy
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for Black-box Vector Optimization
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework designed for black-box vector optimization problems, suitable for multi-objective scientific optimization tasks.

tools.name: TransOPT
tools.one_line_profile: Transfer Optimization System for Black-box Optimization
tools.detailed_description: A system for transfer optimization in black-box settings, enabling knowledge transfer between optimization tasks to accelerate scientific discovery.

tools.name: Chemios
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for accelerating science through automation
tools.detailed_description: A software framework for automating chemical and materials science experiments, facilitating the integration of hardware and AI agents.

tools.name: Dallinger
tools.one_line_profile: Laboratory automation for behavioral and social sciences
tools.detailed_description: A platform for automating experiments in behavioral and social sciences, enabling the creation of 'human culture on a chip' simulations and crowdsourced experiments.

tools.name: nkt_tools
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for accessing NKT photonics devices
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit for interfacing with and controlling NKT Photonics devices, facilitating hardware integration in experimental setups.

tools.name: MetaDE
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated evolutionary framework for large-scale black-box optimization
tools.detailed_description: MetaDE is a GPU-accelerated evolutionary framework that optimizes Differential Evolution (DE) strategies via meta-level evolution. It supports both JAX and PyTorch and dynamically adapts mutation and crossover strategies for efficient large-scale black-box optimization.

tools.name: Emukit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for decision making and uncertainty quantification under uncertainty
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based toolbox of various methods in decision making, uncertainty quantification and statistical emulation, including multi-fidelity methods, experimental design, Bayesian optimisation, and Bayesian quadrature.

tools.name: PyPop7
tools.one_line_profile: Pure-Python library for population-based black-box optimization
tools.detailed_description: PyPop7 is a pure-Python library for population-based black-box optimization (BBO), focusing on large-scale algorithm variants from evolutionary computation, swarm intelligence, and meta-heuristics.

tools.name: Robin
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-agent system for automating scientific discovery
tools.detailed_description: Robin is a multi-agent system designed to automate scientific discovery processes. It leverages LLMs to plan and execute experiments, aiming to close the loop in scientific research workflows.

tools.name: ADO
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for executing benchmarks and computational experiments at scale
tools.detailed_description: ADO is an extendible framework designed for executing benchmarks and computational experiments at scale. It facilitates the management and orchestration of large-scale experimental campaigns, suitable for optimization and scientific computing tasks.

tools.name: Curie
tools.one_line_profile: AI agent system for automated and rigorous scientific experimentation
tools.detailed_description: Curie is an AI agent system designed to automate scientific experimentation. It focuses on rigorous experimental design and execution, enabling autonomous agents to conduct scientific research tasks.

tools.name: LabScript-AI
tools.one_line_profile: AI-powered tool for generating Opentrons laboratory protocols
tools.detailed_description: LabScript-AI is a laboratory automation tool that leverages natural language processing to generate protocols for Opentrons liquid handling robots, simplifying the automation of wet lab experiments.

tools.name: CANN
tools.one_line_profile: Constitutive Artificial Neural Networks for automated model discovery
tools.detailed_description: CANN (Constitutive Artificial Neural Networks) is a library designed for automated model discovery in mechanics and materials science. It integrates neural networks with constitutive modeling to discover material laws from data.

tools.name: Clinical Knowledge Graph (CKG)
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for clinical knowledge graph construction and automated discovery from experimental proteomics data
tools.detailed_description: A platform designed to build a graph database integrating experimental data (mainly proteomics) with diverse biomedical databases. It automates knowledge discovery by leveraging the information contained in the graph, facilitating the analysis of complex clinical and omics data.

tools.name: MetaBox
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking platform for meta-black-box optimization algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking platform designed for Meta-Black-Box Optimization. It provides a standardized environment to evaluate and compare different optimization algorithms, supporting the development of advanced optimization strategies for scientific and engineering problems.

tools.name: GaBOtorch
tools.one_line_profile: Geometry-aware Bayesian Optimization on Riemannian manifolds
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for performing Geometry-aware Bayesian Optimization (GaBO) on Riemannian manifolds. It extends standard Bayesian optimization techniques to work effectively with non-Euclidean search spaces, useful for optimizing parameters in complex geometric constraints.

tools.name: place
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for laboratory automation, instrument control, and experimentation
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed for laboratory automation, providing tools for instrument control and the orchestration of experimental procedures. It facilitates the creation of automated experimental workflows, essential for closed-loop research and high-throughput data generation.

tools.name: Archerfish
tools.one_line_profile: Control software for high-throughput combinatorial experimentation using a retrofitted 3D printer
tools.detailed_description: Software for controlling a retrofitted 3D printer adapted for general high-throughput combinatorial experimentation, specifically within the context of photovoltaics research. It enables the automation of material synthesis and characterization workflows.

tools.name: Bayesian-Optimization-for-Unity
tools.one_line_profile: Unity asset for human-in-the-loop Bayesian optimization
tools.detailed_description: A tool that integrates Bayesian optimization (via BoTorch) into the Unity engine. It implements a human-in-the-loop workflow where the optimizer proposes parameters, collects feedback (e.g., from simulations or user interaction), and iteratively updates the model, suitable for optimizing simulation parameters or design elements.

tools.name: quacc
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for computational materials science and quantum chemistry workflows
tools.detailed_description: A flexible platform for orchestrating computational materials science and quantum chemistry calculations. It is built to handle high-throughput workflows and big data in the context of atomic-scale simulations.

tools.name: pyrelational
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning library for scientific data analysis pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for rapidly implementing active learning pipelines. It covers data management, model development (including Bayesian approximation), and the creation of novel active learning strategies, facilitating efficient data labeling and model improvement in scientific contexts.

tools.name: The AI Scientist
tools.one_line_profile: Fully automated open-ended scientific discovery system using LLMs
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive framework that enables Large Language Models to perform the full lifecycle of scientific research independently, including idea generation, code implementation, experiment execution, and paper writing.

tools.name: The AI Scientist-v2
tools.one_line_profile: Enhanced automated scientific discovery system with agentic tree search
tools.detailed_description: An updated version of The AI Scientist that incorporates agentic tree search to improve the quality and reliability of automated scientific discovery and workshop-level paper generation.

tools.name: DataDrivenDiffEq.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Data-driven modeling and automated discovery of dynamical systems
tools.detailed_description: A library in the SciML ecosystem for automatically discovering differential equations and dynamical systems from data using sparse regression and other data-driven techniques.

tools.name: ADMMBO
tools.one_line_profile: ADMM framework for Bayesian Optimization with unknown constraints
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the ADMMBO algorithm designed for Bayesian Optimization tasks involving unknown constraints, utilizing the Alternating Direction Method of Multipliers.

tools.name: shgo
tools.one_line_profile: Simplicial Homology Global Optimization algorithm
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the Simplicial Homology Global Optimization (SHGO) algorithm, suitable for solving black-box and derivative-free global optimization problems in scientific computing.

tools.name: SEML
tools.one_line_profile: Slurm Experiment Management Library
tools.detailed_description: A tool for managing and tracking scientific experiments on Slurm-based high-performance computing clusters, handling configuration, scheduling, and result collection.

tools.name: ActiveLearningPipelines
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for specifying and executing active learning pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to specify, execute, and monitor the performance of active learning pipelines, facilitating the development of data-efficient machine learning models for scientific applications.

tools.name: MOE
tools.one_line_profile: Metric Optimization Engine for global black-box optimization
tools.detailed_description: A global, black-box optimization engine designed for real-world metric optimization, implementing Bayesian Global Optimization with Gaussian Processes.

tools.name: Geochemistrypi
tools.one_line_profile: Automated machine learning framework for geochemistry discovery
tools.detailed_description: An open-source, highly automated machine learning Python framework specifically designed for data-driven discovery in geochemistry.

tools.name: MOOSE
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-based automated open-domain scientific hypotheses discovery
tools.detailed_description: A framework leveraging Large Language Models for the automated discovery of scientific hypotheses in open domains, facilitating the initial stages of the scientific method.

tools.name: ProtTrans
tools.one_line_profile: State-of-the-art pretrained language models for proteins
tools.detailed_description: A collection of state-of-the-art pretrained language models (Transformer-based) for protein sequence analysis and prediction tasks.

tools.name: CodeScientist
tools.one_line_profile: Automated scientific discovery system for code-based experiments
tools.detailed_description: An automated system that uses Large Language Models to conduct scientific discovery through code-based experiments, capable of generating hypotheses, writing code, and analyzing results.

tools.name: DiscoveryWorld
tools.one_line_profile: Virtual environment for evaluating automated scientific discovery agents
tools.detailed_description: A virtual environment and benchmark suite designed for developing and evaluating the capabilities of automated scientific discovery agents in simulated settings.

tools.name: HesBO
tools.one_line_profile: High-dimensional Bayesian Optimization algorithms
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of high-dimensional Bayesian Optimization algorithms using random embeddings to handle optimization in large search spaces.

tools.name: vsi2tif
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for cellSens VSI microscopy images to pyramidal TIFF
tools.detailed_description: A utility tool for converting whole slide images (WSI) from the proprietary cellSens VSI format to standard pyramidal TIFF format, facilitating microscopy data processing.

tools.name: Olympus
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking framework for noisy optimization and experiment planning
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking framework specifically designed for noisy optimization and experiment planning tasks in scientific discovery, facilitating the evaluation of optimization algorithms.

tools.name: Coupling_ABAQUS_MATLAB
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for coupling ABAQUS and MATLAB for closed-loop optimization
tools.detailed_description: A Software-in-the-Loop (SiL) framework that enables the interconnection of ABAQUS (Finite Element Analysis) and MATLAB for offline optimization and closed-loop system performance analysis.

tools.name: autolab
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for laboratory instruments control and experiment automation
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed for controlling laboratory instruments and automating scientific experiments, facilitating data acquisition and hardware interfacing.

tools.name: RoBO
tools.one_line_profile: Robust Bayesian Optimization framework
tools.detailed_description: A framework for Bayesian optimization, providing robust implementations of various acquisition functions and surrogate models for optimizing black-box functions.

tools.name: black-it
tools.one_line_profile: Black-box calibration kit for Agent-Based Models (ABM)
tools.detailed_description: A Python kit for calibrating Agent-Based Models (ABM) using black-box optimization techniques, developed by the Bank of Italy.

tools.name: BayesianOptimization
tools.one_line_profile: Global optimization with Gaussian Processes
tools.detailed_description: A pure Python implementation of Bayesian global optimization with Gaussian Processes, widely used for hyperparameter tuning and black-box function optimization.

tools.name: bluesky
tools.one_line_profile: Experiment orchestration and data acquisition system
tools.detailed_description: A library for experiment orchestration and data acquisition, widely used in synchrotrons and laboratories to manage hardware and collect data.

tools.name: ChemoSpec
tools.one_line_profile: Chemometric analysis of spectra
tools.detailed_description: A collection of R functions for the chemometric analysis of spectroscopic data, including plotting and exploratory data analysis.

tools.name: oiffile
tools.one_line_profile: Reader for Olympus image files (OIF and OIB)
tools.detailed_description: A Python library to read Olympus Image Format (OIF) and Olympus Image Binary (OIB) files, commonly used in microscopy.

tools.name: robots
tools.one_line_profile: Laboratory automation toolkits
tools.detailed_description: Toolkits for laboratory automation, developed by the Chodera Lab, aimed at automating chemical and biological experiments.

tools.name: MetaOpt
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel black-box function optimization library
tools.detailed_description: MetaOpt is a library designed to optimize black-box functions in parallel, suitable for hyperparameter tuning and other derivative-free optimization tasks in scientific computing.

tools.name: ClearML
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated MLOps platform for experiment management and orchestration
tools.detailed_description: ClearML is an open-source MLOps solution that provides experiment management, data management, and orchestration, widely used to track and manage scientific AI experiments and closed-loop workflows.

tools.name: Entmoot
tools.one_line_profile: Multiobjective black-box optimization using gradient-boosted trees
tools.detailed_description: Entmoot is a framework for optimizing black-box functions, particularly useful in engineering and scientific design problems where gradients are unavailable, leveraging tree-based models.

tools.name: RBFOpt
tools.one_line_profile: Radial Basis Function based black-box optimization library
tools.detailed_description: RBFOpt is a Python library for black-box optimization using Radial Basis Functions, designed for expensive function evaluations common in scientific simulations.

tools.name: Pi4U
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian Uncertainty Quantification and Optimization framework
tools.detailed_description: Pi4U is a high-performance framework designed for Bayesian uncertainty quantification and optimization, facilitating complex scientific simulations and data analysis.

tools.name: ESCALATE
tools.one_line_profile: Experiment Specification, Capture and Laboratory Automation Technology
tools.detailed_description: ESCALATE is an ontological framework and software package for defining, capturing, and reporting scientific experiments, specifically designed for laboratory automation and materials science data management.

tools.name: MO-MEMES
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-objective Bayesian optimization for molecular screening
tools.detailed_description: MO-MEMES extends the MEMES framework to support multi-objective Bayesian optimization, specifically tailored for enhanced molecular screening tasks in chemistry and drug discovery.

tools.name: axtreme
tools.one_line_profile: Extensions for Ax and BoTorch for industrial optimization
tools.detailed_description: Axtreme provides extensions to the Ax and BoTorch libraries, developed for the RaPiD project, to facilitate advanced Bayesian optimization workflows in scientific and industrial contexts.

tools.name: Uni-Lab-OS
tools.one_line_profile: Operating system platform for laboratory automation
tools.detailed_description: Uni-Lab-OS is a platform designed to manage and automate laboratory equipment and workflows, serving as an operating system for smart laboratories.

tools.name: Dragonfly (Optimization)
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable Bayesian optimization library
tools.detailed_description: Dragonfly is an open-source Python library for scalable Bayesian optimization, designed to handle high-dimensional parameter spaces and multi-fidelity evaluations for scientific and engineering applications.

tools.name: AutoGrow4
tools.one_line_profile: Semi-automated genetic algorithm for de novo drug design and ligand optimization
tools.detailed_description: AutoGrow4 is an open-source program for semi-automated computer-aided drug discovery. It uses a genetic algorithm to evolve predicted ligands on demand, generating entirely novel drug-like molecules and optimizing preexisting ligands without being limited to a virtual library.

tools.name: Bacting
tools.one_line_profile: Scriptable platform for chemo- and bioinformatics data processing
tools.detailed_description: Bacting is an open-source platform for chemo- and bioinformatics based on Bioclipse. It defines common domain objects and wraps functionality to provide a toolkit-independent, scriptable solution for handling life sciences data.

tools.name: BoFire
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for experimental design and Bayesian optimization
tools.detailed_description: BoFire is a framework for experimental design and (multi-objective) Bayesian optimization, specifically tailored for scientific experiments and materials discovery.

tools.name: Ax
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive Experimentation Platform for optimizing black-box systems
tools.detailed_description: Ax is an accessible, general-purpose platform for understanding, managing, automating, and optimizing experiments. It is widely used in scientific research for adaptive experimentation and Bayesian optimization.

tools.name: AEPsych
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive experimentation framework for psychophysics and perception
tools.detailed_description: AEPsych is a tool for adaptive experimentation in psychophysics and perception research, built on top of GPyTorch and BoTorch. It enables efficient data collection in human-subject experiments.

tools.name: Dagger
tools.one_line_profile: Experiment orchestration and reproducibility tool
tools.detailed_description: Dagger is a library designed to facilitate experiment orchestration, ensuring reproducibility and efficient management of complex experimental workflows in research.

tools.name: noWorkflow
tools.one_line_profile: Provenance capture infrastructure for scientific scripts
tools.detailed_description: noWorkflow is a tool that transparently captures provenance from Python scripts, allowing scientists to analyze experiment history and reproducibility without using a heavy Scientific Workflow Management System.

tools.name: MOSKopt
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation-based stochastic black-box optimization toolbox
tools.detailed_description: MOSKopt is a MATLAB toolbox for simulation-based stochastic black-box optimization under uncertainty, utilizing Stochastic Kriging and Monte Carlo simulation.

tools.name: Rocketsled
tools.one_line_profile: Black-box optimizer for high-throughput materials computing
tools.detailed_description: Rocketsled is a plug-and-play black-box optimization framework designed for high-throughput computing (HTC) environments, specifically tailored for materials science workflows (e.g., with FireWorks).

tools.name: HEBO
tools.one_line_profile: Heteroscedastic Evolutionary Bayesian Optimisation library
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Bayesian optimization and Reinforcement Learning library featuring the HEBO algorithm, winner of the NeurIPS 2020 Black-Box Optimization Challenge. It supports multi-objective and constrained optimization.

tools.name: PSE
tools.one_line_profile: Parallelized Symbolic Enumeration for symbolic regression
tools.detailed_description: A fast and efficient symbolic expression discovery tool that evaluates millions of expressions simultaneously on GPU. It implements the PSE/PSRN method for symbolic regression, useful for discovering physical laws from data.

tools.name: BayesianOptimization.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian Optimization package for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package designed for Bayesian optimization of black-box functions, facilitating efficient search in high-dimensional parameter spaces for scientific simulations and models.

tools.name: BlackBoxOptimizationBenchmarking.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking suite for black-box optimization in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia implementation/wrapper for benchmarking black-box optimization algorithms, likely based on the BBOB/COCO standard, enabling comparative analysis of optimization strategies.

tools.name: memristor-discovery
tools.one_line_profile: Automated experiment control for memristor characterization
tools.detailed_description: A Java application for automating experiments and data collection on memristor devices using Digilent Analog Discovery 2 hardware, facilitating materials science and neuromorphic hardware research.

tools.name: dragonfly-legacy
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale climate and urban heat island modeling plugin
tools.detailed_description: A legacy plugin for the Dragonfly toolset (part of Ladybug Tools) focused on modeling large-scale climate phenomena and urban heat islands, used in environmental science and building physics.

tools.name: BBOPlace-Bench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for Black-Box Optimization in Chip Placement
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking suite for evaluating black-box optimization algorithms specifically in the context of chip placement (EDA), developed by LAMDA-BBO group.

tools.name: lightlab
tools.one_line_profile: Laboratory instrumentation and automation framework
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for laboratory instrumentation and automation, facilitating the control of hardware and management of experiments in photonics and electronics labs.

tools.name: HyperMapper
tools.one_line_profile: Black-box optimizer based on Bayesian Optimization
tools.detailed_description: A multi-objective black-box optimization tool based on Bayesian Optimization, designed for design space exploration and parameter tuning.

tools.name: Contrast
tools.one_line_profile: Data acquisition framework for beamline experiments
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight data acquisition framework designed for orchestrating beamline experiments at synchrotron facilities (MAX IV Laboratory).

tools.name: BoTorch
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian optimization in PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A library for Bayesian Optimization built on PyTorch, providing a modular and easily extensible interface for composing Bayesian optimization primitives.

tools.name: HumpDay
tools.one_line_profile: Optimizer selection and benchmarking tool
tools.detailed_description: A package that helps choose the best Python global optimizer for a given problem by providing Elo ratings and benchmarking capabilities for black-box derivative-free optimizers.

tools.name: Whales
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning pipeline for whale identification
tools.detailed_description: An active learning pipeline designed for identifying whales in high-resolution satellite imagery, demonstrating the application of AI in ecological monitoring.

tools.name: ParamHelpers
tools.one_line_profile: Helpers for parameters in black-box optimization
tools.detailed_description: A utility library for handling parameters in black-box optimization, tuning, and machine learning, part of the mlr ecosystem.

tools.name: bbotk
tools.one_line_profile: Black-box optimization framework for R
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive framework for black-box optimization in R, providing classes and methods for defining and solving optimization problems.

tools.name: Mole
tools.one_line_profile: CLI tool for managing and executing experiments with robots and autonomous systems
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to assist with testing and experimentation involving robots and autonomous systems, likely providing workflow management and execution capabilities for research experiments.

tools.name: Skeletor
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight module for machine learning experiment orchestration
tools.detailed_description: A Python module designed to orchestrate machine learning experiments, handling configuration, logging, and experiment tracking to streamline the research workflow.

tools.name: COCO
tools.one_line_profile: Numerical Black-Box Optimization Benchmarking Framework
tools.detailed_description: A platform for comparing continuous optimizers in a black-box setting, providing a standard test suite and post-processing tools for analyzing optimization performance.

tools.name: Kurobako
tools.one_line_profile: Black-box optimization benchmarking tool
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool and library for benchmarking black-box optimization algorithms, supporting parallel execution and various problem suites.

tools.name: Yabox
tools.one_line_profile: Black-box optimization library for Python
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight Python library for black-box optimization, focusing on ease of use and visualization of optimization landscapes.

tools.name: Blackbox
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel optimization of expensive black-box functions
tools.detailed_description: A Python module designed for the parallel optimization of expensive black-box functions, suitable for tuning parameters of simulations or experiments.

tools.name: IEMS
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive Experiment Management System for Machine Translation
tools.detailed_description: A system designed to manage interactive experiments, specifically targeted at machine translation tasks, facilitating the experiment lifecycle.

tools.name: AutoGP.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Bayesian model discovery for time series data
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library for automated Bayesian model discovery, specifically designed for analyzing time series data using Gaussian Processes.

tools.name: PyLECO
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of the Laboratory Experiment COntrol (LECO) protocol
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing the LECO protocol, enabling standardized communication and control for laboratory experiments and measurement hardware.

tools.name: rsopt
tools.one_line_profile: Configuration and execution of large black-box optimization problems
tools.detailed_description: A framework for the flexible configuration and execution of large-scale black-box optimization problems, often used in scientific computing contexts like particle accelerator design.

tools.name: Limbo
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight framework for Gaussian processes and Bayesian optimization
tools.detailed_description: A C++11 library for Gaussian processes and Bayesian optimization, designed to be lightweight and efficient for robotics and black-box function optimization.

tools.name: Octopus
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time laboratory automation and monitoring
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based system for real-time automation and monitoring of laboratory equipment and experiments.

tools.name: BlackBoxOptim.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Black-box optimization library for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive global optimization library for Julia, supporting various black-box optimization algorithms without requiring gradient information.

tools.name: Dragonflye
tools.one_line_profile: Bacterial isolate genome assembler for Nanopore reads
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for assembling bacterial isolate genomes from Nanopore reads, automating the assembly and polishing process.

tools.name: SafEDMD-SOS
tools.one_line_profile: Koopman-based data-driven control with stability guarantees
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolkit for data-driven control using Koopman operators, providing closed-loop stability and performance guarantees via sum-of-squares optimization.

tools.name: BayesOpt_Attack
tools.one_line_profile: Targeted black-box adversarial attack using Bayesian Optimization
tools.detailed_description: A tool for performing targeted black-box adversarial attacks on machine learning models using Bayesian Optimization to minimize query counts.

tools.name: MIPROv3 (open-claude-code)
tools.one_line_profile: Advanced prompt optimization framework using Bayesian optimization
tools.detailed_description: A framework for optimizing prompts for Large Language Models (LLMs) using Bayesian optimization and evolutionary strategies to enhance efficiency and adaptability.

tools.name: Trieste
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian optimization toolbox built on TensorFlow
tools.detailed_description: A Bayesian optimization toolbox built on TensorFlow, designed for efficient global optimization of black-box functions. It supports active learning and is suitable for closed-loop research workflows.

tools.name: SigOpt EvalSet
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for black-box optimization strategies
tools.detailed_description: A collection of test functions and benchmarks suitable for evaluating black-box optimization strategies, facilitating the development and comparison of optimization algorithms used in scientific research.

tools.name: dmpbbo
tools.one_line_profile: Library for Dynamical Movement Primitives and Black-Box Optimization
tools.detailed_description: A Python/C++ library combining Dynamical Movement Primitives (DMP) with Black-Box Optimization (BBO), widely used in robotics and motor control research for trajectory optimization and learning.

tools.name: Summit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for optimizing chemical reactions using machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A package for optimizing chemical reactions using machine learning (Bayesian Optimization) and automated experiments. It provides tools for reaction optimization benchmarks and interfacing with self-driving labs.

tools.name: Bayesmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark framework for Bayesian optimization methods
tools.detailed_description: A framework for benchmarking Bayesian optimization methods on real-world machine learning tasks and synthetic functions, enabling rigorous comparison of optimization algorithms.

tools.name: labbench
tools.one_line_profile: Python scripting tools for streamlined laboratory automation
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python tools designed to streamline laboratory automation, facilitating the management and execution of experiments in a research setting.

tools.name: benderopt
tools.one_line_profile: Black-box optimization library for hyperparameter tuning
tools.detailed_description: A black-box optimization library designed to minimize expensive-to-evaluate functions, suitable for hyperparameter tuning and experimental design optimization.

tools.name: WebLab-Deusto
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable, web-based remote laboratory management system
tools.detailed_description: A remote laboratory management system that enables the offering of experiments over the Internet, managing user access and experiment execution.

tools.name: ssvio
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight stereo visual SLAM system
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight stereo visual SLAM system implementation including closed-loop detection, front-end tracking, back-end optimization, and visualization.

tools.name: SquirRL
tools.one_line_profile: Automating attack discovery on blockchain incentive mechanisms via RL
tools.detailed_description: A framework using Deep Reinforcement Learning to automate the discovery of attacks on blockchain incentive mechanisms, aiding in the security analysis of protocols.

tools.name: ytopt
tools.one_line_profile: Machine-learning-based autotuning and hyperparameter optimization framework
tools.detailed_description: A framework for autotuning and hyperparameter optimization using Bayesian Optimization, designed to optimize performance of scientific applications and kernels.

tools.name: Olympus
tools.one_line_profile: Universal task router for computer vision tasks
tools.detailed_description: A universal task router designed to unify different computer vision models and datasets, facilitating task routing and orchestration in vision pipelines.

tools.name: AutoOED
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Optimal Experimental Design Platform
tools.detailed_description: A platform for automated optimal experimental design, enabling researchers to optimize experimental parameters efficiently using machine learning and optimization techniques.

tools.name: AutoRecon
tools.one_line_profile: Automated 3D object discovery and reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: A framework for automated 3D object discovery and reconstruction from images, utilizing neural rendering and optimization techniques.
